GRAND RAPIDS , MI -- An anonymous donor has given Grand Rapids Public Schools Harrison Park Elementary $ 31,700 to support literacy programming .
GRAND RAPIDS , MI -- An anonymous donor has given Grand Rapids Public Schools Harrison Park Elementary $ 31,700 to support literacy programming .
The donated was unanimously accepted by the school board on Monday , May 19 .
Roberta King , vice president of public relations and marketing for the foundation , said the private donation was received in early May .
The board Finance Committee recommended approval .
